data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Manubah, Tunisia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Manubah, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Manubah prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Manubah, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Manubah to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Lord, please remember the Berber, Jofra people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, please give every church in the state of Manubah a passion to plant another simple church.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 113 believers living in the state of Manubah. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.section_summary:
the state of Manubah, Tunisia has a population of 379,500.

We estimate Manubah has 113 people who might know Jesus, 1,591 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 377,796 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3,358 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Manubah, Tunisia to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.
